mapper.insert: INSERT INTO community(user_id, comm_room_id, type, content, comm_created_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{roomId}, #{type},#{content}, #{createdAt})
mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id, u.nickname, u.profile_image AS userProfile, b.badge_image_url AS badgeImageUrl, b.badge_name AS badgeName, b.badge_level AS badgeLevel FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_score us ON us.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN badge b ON b.min_score <= COALESCE( us.trust_score + us.review_score + us.trade_score - us.penalty_score, 0 ) WHERE u.user_id = #{userId} LIMIT 1

SELECT c.community_id AS communityId, c.user_id AS userId, c.comm_room_id AS commRoomId, c.type AS type, c.content AS content, c.comm_created_at AS commCreatedAt, u.nickname AS nickname, u.profile_image AS userProfile FROM community c JOIN users u ON u.user_id = c.user_id WHERE c.type = 'MEGAPHONE' ORDER BY c.comm_created_at DESC LIMIT #{limit}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO community(user_id, comm_room_id, content, action_type, comm_created_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{roomId}, NULL, 'JOIN', #{createdAt})
